question: Today vaginal sponge failure rate is?
Highest failure rate is seen in:
exp: Ans: b (Condom) Ref: Shaw, 13th ed, p. 217. Measurement of contraceptive efficacy. Pearl index: -Pregnancy rate per 100 women years. Pearl index =Total accidental pregnancy x 1200. Total months of exposure to unintended pregnancy. Life table technique. Pregnancy rate is expressed as 100 women per year. Failure rates Condom. Natural FP method. Spermicides. Withdrawal. question: Barrier type of contraception among the following:
exp: Ref: Dutta textbook of obstetrics 5th ed pg. 534. Explanation: BARRIER METHODS OF CONTRACEPTIONMale-condoms. Female-condom, diaphragm, cervical cap. Spermicidal creams, jelly and foam tablets Mechanism of action: Prevents sperm deposition in vagina, Prevents sperm penetration through the cervical os, Spermicides cause sperm immobilization.
